City Commission
===============

* [Home](https://www.cityoflaferia.com)
* [Boards and Commissions](https://www.cityoflaferia.com/boards-and-commissions/)
* City Commission



The City commission is comprised of the Mayor and City Commissioners elected at large to serve three year terms. city commission meetings ate held on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each month at the City Commission Meeting room located at 115 E. Commercial Ave.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Click here to access Document Portal](https://portal.laserfiche.com/Portal/browse.aspx?repo=r-09ea5550)

#### City of La Feria

**La Feria City Hall  
La Feria Utilities Board**  
**La Feria Industrial Dev. Corp.**  
**La Feria Economic Dev. Corp.**  
115 E. Commercial Ave.  
La Feria, TX 78559

8:00a.m. – 4:30p.m.  
(956) 797 – 2261  
Fax: (956) 797 – 1898  
[www.cityoflaferia.com](https://cityoflaferia.com)

[(956) 797-3121](tel:956-797-3121)
